amendment.description: To strike the section of the bill establishing preferred places of accommodation for Federal employees and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4107 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4107 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S7636; text: CR S7636) To strike the section of the bill establishing preferred places of accommodation for Federal employees and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4107 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murray.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4107 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
